name: Cobbleswarm
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Stings
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 15 (6d4) piercing damage, or 7 (3d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half its hp or fewer.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the cobbleswarm remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from normal stones.

special_abilities.name: Shifting Floor
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the cobbleswarm moves into a creature's space or starts its turn in another creature's space, the creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A prone creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check to stand up in a space occupied by the swarm.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The cobbleswarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny stone. The swarm can't regain hp or gain temporary hp.
